text:
namOq hira#Nya bAhavE sEnAqnyE# diqSAMcaq pata#yEq namOq 			
namO# vRuqkShEByOq hari#kESEByaH paSUqnAM pata#yEq namOq 		
nama#H saqspi~jja#rAyaq tviShI#matE pathIqnAM pata#yEq namOq 	 		
namO# baBluqSAya# vivyAqdhinE-&nnA#nAMq pata#yEq namOq 			
namOq hari#kESAyO-pavIqtinE# puqShTAnAMq pata#yEq namOq 				
namO# Baqvasya# hEqtyai jaga#tAMq pata#yEq namOq 						
namO# ruqdrAyA#-tatAqvinEq kShEtrA#NAMq pata#yEq namOq 				
namaH# sUqtAyA-ha#ntyAyaq vanA#nAMq pata#yEq namOq namOq - [  ] 5
